about_the_game:
The start of your adventure as the young Twinsen will find you imprisoned in the Citadel Island health center… for having dared to defy the henchmen of Dr. Funfrock, a genius who has seized control thanks to his revolutionary inventions.

Your first mission is to escape and rejoin your sister, Luna, who has been left to fend for herself since your capture. Once free, you can explore the island, interact with its residents, and take on the robotic clones and the soldiers patrolling the island under Dr. Funfrock’s orders.

Accused of rebellion, Luna has been taken away… and, to find her, you’re going to need all your perseverance and, more importantly, your incredible Magicball.

In the full version of Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest:

Play as Twinsen, a young Quetch, willing to do whatever it takes to find his sister and foil Dr. Funfrock’s plans. This remake of the emblematic 1994 action-adventure game takes you on a journey through a number of mysterious regions, full of danger and colorful characters. Alternate between exploration, puzzles, encounters, and battles to uncover Dr. Funfrock’s dastardly schemes.

With its unique mix of 3D isometric gameplay, humor and epic moments, Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest will take you on an unforgettable adventure.
Fight enemies with your Magicball and immerse yourself in an updated adventure, complete with music reworked by the original composer that left its mark on an entire generation of players.

Are you ready to help Twinsen find his sister and thwart Dr. Funfrock’s evil plans? The adventure begins here!
detailed_description:
Disclaimer

The contents of this demo may differ from that of the final game product.

This demo offers an auto-save mode, but this data will not be transferred to the full version of the game.

Dear players,

You’re about to discover the demo version of Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest, and everyone here at [2.21] would like to thank you. We hope you enjoy the demo!

The game is due for release in a few weeks and, despite the care we’ve put into this demo, we might still have a few more tweaks to make to add the finishing touches to the unique experience that awaits you. So, you may still encounter a few stubborn bugs that we’re trying our best to resolve.

Please feel free to get in touch on [2.21]’s Discord and share your feedback with us!

Thanks again for your support, and see you soon on Twinsun!
